item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI pushes ahead with for-profit plans and talks to give Altman a stake
2. US and allies call for 21-day ceasefire between Israel and Hizbollah
3. Saudi Arabia ready to abandon $100 crude target to take back market share
4. [Opinion] The end of the popular politician
5. Trump attacks Kyiv for ‘refusing to make a deal’ to end war
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
